RVU Lookup by Date of Service, HCPCS, and Place of Service

Source: R/rvu_lookup.R
rvu_lookup.Rd

RVU Lookup by Date of Service, HCPCS, and Place of Service

Usage

rvu_lookup(dos, hcpcs, pos, ...)

Arguments

dos

<date> date of service; YYYY-MM-DD

hcpcs

<chr> HCPCS code or vector of HCPCS codes

pos

<chr> Place of Service indicator; Facility or Non-Facility

...

additional arguments

Value

<tibble> containing RVU values for specified parameters

Examples

rvu_lookup(dos = "2024-03-31", hcpcs = "99215", pos = "Non-Facility")
#> # A tibble: 1 × 31
#>   source_file date_start date_end                    date_iv hcpcs mod  
#>   <chr>       <date>     <date>                   <iv<date>> <chr> <chr>
#> 1 rvu24ar_jan 2024-03-09 2024-03-31 [2024-03-09, 2024-04-01) 99215 NA   
#> # ℹ 25 more variables: description <chr>, status_code <chr>,
#> #   not_used_for_medicare_payment <chr>, work_rvu <dbl>, non_fac_pe_rvu <dbl>,
#> #   non_fac_indicator <chr>, mp_rvu <dbl>, non_facility_total <dbl>,
#> #   pctc_ind <chr>, glob_days <chr>, pre_op <dbl>, intra_op <dbl>,
#> #   post_op <dbl>, mult_proc <chr>, bilat_surg <chr>, asst_surg <chr>,
#> #   co_surg <chr>, team_surg <chr>, endo_base <chr>, conv_factor <dbl>,
#> #   physician_supervision_of_diagnostic_procedures <chr>, …
rvu_lookup(dos = "2023-02-28", hcpcs = "99215", pos = "Facility")
#> # A tibble: 1 × 30
#>   source_file date_start date_end   hcpcs mod   description          status_code
#>   <chr>       <date>     <date>     <chr> <chr> <chr>                <chr>      
#> 1 rvu23a_jan  2023-01-01 2023-03-31 99215 NA    Office o/p est hi 4… A          
#> # ℹ 23 more variables: not_used_for_medicare_payment <chr>, work_rvu <dbl>,
#> #   facility_pe_rvu <dbl>, facility_indicator <chr>, mp_rvu <dbl>,
#> #   facility_total <dbl>, pctc_ind <chr>, glob_days <chr>, pre_op <dbl>,
#> #   intra_op <dbl>, post_op <dbl>, mult_proc <chr>, bilat_surg <chr>,
#> #   asst_surg <chr>, co_surg <chr>, team_surg <chr>, endo_base <chr>,
#> #   conv_factor <dbl>, physician_supervision_of_diagnostic_procedures <chr>,
#> #   calculation_flag <chr>, diagnostic_imaging_family_indicator <chr>, …
rvu_lookup(dos = "2022-02-28", hcpcs = "99215", pos = "Facility")
#> # A tibble: 1 × 30
#>   source_file date_start date_end   hcpcs mod   description          status_code
#>   <chr>       <date>     <date>     <chr> <chr> <chr>                <chr>      
#> 1 rvu22a_jan  2022-01-01 2022-03-31 99215 NA    Office o/p est hi 4… A          
#> # ℹ 23 more variables: not_used_for_medicare_payment <chr>, work_rvu <dbl>,
#> #   facility_pe_rvu <dbl>, facility_indicator <chr>, mp_rvu <dbl>,
#> #   facility_total <dbl>, pctc_ind <chr>, glob_days <chr>, pre_op <dbl>,
#> #   intra_op <dbl>, post_op <dbl>, mult_proc <chr>, bilat_surg <chr>,
#> #   asst_surg <chr>, co_surg <chr>, team_surg <chr>, endo_base <chr>,
#> #   conv_factor <dbl>, physician_supervision_of_diagnostic_procedures <chr>,
#> #   calculation_flag <chr>, diagnostic_imaging_family_indicator <chr>, …
